name: massivedecks
description: Pulls together both the server and client for Massive Decks, a comedy party game.
author: Reread Games <team@rereadgames.com>

scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.build-client: (cd client && npm ci && npm install --only=dev && npm run build)
scripts.build-server: (cd server && npm ci && npm install --only=dev && npm run build && cp package*.json dist && (cd dist && npm ci --only=prod))
